Name: closable
Description: Defines if close icon should be displayed or not.

Name: closeOnEscape
Description: Defines if dialog should close when escape key is pressed.

Name: responsive
Description: In responsive mode, dialog adjusts itself based on screen width.

Name: rendered
Description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.

Name: dynamic
Description: Dynamic mode allows dialog to fetch it's contents before it's shown rather than on page load which is useful to  reduce initial page load times. Default is false.

Name: appendTo
Description: Alternative to appendToBody. Appends the dialog to the given search expression.

Name: iconStyleClass
Description: Specific additional style for icon, color for example. We already provided 3 classes: portal-dialog-info-icon, portal-dialog-warning-icon, portal-dialog-error-icon
